official_title: Recognizing and commending Baylor University quarterback Robert Griffin III for winning the 2011 Heisman Trophy and for his academic and athletic accomplishments.

summary.text: Congratulates Robert Griffin III for winning the 2011 Heisman Trophy and for his academic and athletic accomplishments.

titles.title: Recognizing and commending Baylor University quarterback Robert Griffin III for winning the 2011 Heisman Trophy and for his academic and athletic accomplishments.
